item.title: Creating a Comprehensive Hackathon Database with Outerbase and Supabase 🚀🛠️
item.description: Introduction 📝 Link to heading In this tutorial, we will walk you through the process of creating a robust hackathon database using Outerbase and Supabase. This database will allow you to efficiently manage hackathon details, challenges, teams, submissions, judges, and judging criteria. 🏆🔍 Prerequisites 🧰✅ Link to heading Before we begin, make sure you have the following: An account on Supabase: Sign up here . 🌐🔗 A project set up on Supabase with credentials generated.
